TopicTitle: Screen Goes Black When SRBs Start?

Articles.Content:
Whenever I try launching a spacecraft with SRBs the screen goes black with only the flight UI parts showing. It is getting really annoying because the majority of my build use SRBs.

Here's the log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tvAlF-B8Qdo-CfAOc9w4YglUjbDa6nis/view?usp=sharing
